quote: I wasn't used to looking ahead. Not like Jack. Maybe that was why he had that ready grin. I could see through the dust, but he could see through time, and he didn't even need magic to do it.
quote_letters: I WASNT USED TO LOOKING AHEAD NOT LIKE JACK MAYBE THAT WAS WHY HE HAD THAT READY GRIN I COULD SEE THROUGH THE DUST BUT HE COULD SEE THROUGH TIME AND HE DIDNT EVEN NEED MAGIC TO DO IT
